extDescription.message: Pre-wallet risk preview for Web3 transactions (MVP).

tipText.message: Tip: If you don't trust the site, close the tab. You can revoke approvals later in your dashboard or using revoke tools.

optionsSubtitle.message: Tune what gets blocked/warned. Defaults are safe for an MVP.

connectOverlayDesc.message: Show an overlay before wallet connection popups.

blockHighRiskDesc.message: If off, HIGH risk still warns but won’t auto-block.

domainChecksDesc.message: Warn on suspicious host patterns (punycode, lookalikes, etc.).

allowlistDesc.message: If the current site matches, domain warnings are suppressed.

chainChangeReason.message: Site is requesting a network change in your wallet.

watchAssetReason.message: Site is requesting to add/watch a token or asset.

typedDataWarnReason.message: Typed-data signature requested (commonly used for permits).

txWarnReason.message: Transaction request detected. Review recipient and value.

nftOperatorApprovalReason.message: NFT operator approval (setApprovalForAll=true). This can allow moving all NFTs in a collection.

domainDoubleDashReason.message: Double-dash in hostname (often used in lookalikes).

trustInAllowlist.message: This site matches your trusted list ($1).

trustNotInAllowlist.message: This site is NOT in your trusted list.

trustNotInSuggested.message: Not in the suggested trusted domains list.

trustedSitesDesc.message: Short curated list you can add to your allowlist.

trustReasonManyHyphens.message: Many hyphens in the domain (common in lookalikes).

trustReasonBrandLookalike.message: Brand-like wording in domain but not the official domain.

trustReasonNoHost.message: Could not read the site hostname.

trustReasonAllowlisted.message: Domain is in your trusted list: $1

explain_connect_why.message: This lets the site show your account and ask for signatures/approvals/transactions later.

explain_sign_short.message: No gas, but signatures can authorize actions

explain_sign_why.message: Sites use signatures to log in, verify ownership, or authorize off-chain actions.

explain_typed_why.message: Typed-data is often used for permits (token approvals without a separate on-chain approve).

explain_tx_why.message: This will create an on-chain transaction if you approve it in your wallet.

explain_switch_short.message: Change the selected chain in your wallet

explain_switch_why.message: Some sites require a specific network to function.

explain_addchain_short.message: Add a new chain configuration to your wallet

explain_addchain_why.message: Wallet may add RPC details for a chain requested by the site.

explain_watchasset_short.message: Add a token/asset to your wallet UI

explain_watchasset_why.message: This does not spend funds, but confirm the token details are correct.

explain_generic_short.message: A site is requesting a wallet action

explain_generic_why.message: Review details in your wallet and confirm the site URL.

human_connect_whatIs.message: Connects your wallet address to this site (like logging in).

human_connect_sees_3.message: Public on-chain activity (tokens/NFTs are public data)

human_connect_not_1.message: It does NOT reveal your seed phrase or wallet password

human_connect_not_2.message: It does NOT move funds automatically by itself

human_connect_why_1.message: To show your account and balances in the UI

human_connect_why_3.message: To request approvals/transactions later (with your confirmation)

human_connect_risk_1.message: Privacy/tracking: it can link your address to this site

human_connect_risk_2.message: Phishing steps: next prompts may ask for signatures/approvals

human_connect_risk_3.message: Lookalike domains: fake sites often start with a harmless connect

human_connect_safe_1.message: Treat connect like sharing an identity: only do it on sites you recognize.

human_connect_next_1.message: Double-check the domain (spelling, HTTPS, no punycode)

human_connect_next_2.message: If unsure, cancel and open the site from a trusted bookmark

human_connect_reco_suspicious.message: Cancel and verify the URL in another way (bookmark/search), then try again.

human_connect_reco_ok.message: Continue only if you recognize the site and the URL looks right.

human_sign_whatIs.message: Creates a cryptographic signature. It usually does not cost gas, but it can authorize actions.

human_sign_risk_1.message: Signing unknown text can approve off-site actions or logins you didn't intend

human_sign_risk_2.message: Blind signing can hide what you're authorizing

human_typed_whatIs.message: Signs structured data (typed-data). Often used for permits/authorizations.

human_typed_risk_1.message: Typed-data may include token permits that behave like approvals

human_sign_safe_1.message: Prefer wallets that show clear human-readable signing details.

human_sign_next_1.message: Verify the site URL and read the message/typed-data carefully

human_sign_next_2.message: If you see vague prompts, cancel and ask the site for context

human_sign_reco_suspicious.message: Cancel. Suspicious domains + signature prompts are a common phishing pattern.

human_sign_reco_ok.message: Only continue if you understand what the signature is for and trust the site.

human_approve_whatIs.message: An approval lets a contract spend your tokens later (up to the approved amount).

human_approve_risk_1.message: Approvals can be abused if the spender contract is malicious or compromised

human_approve_risk_unlimited.message: Unlimited approval means it may spend ALL your token balance

human_approve_safe_1.message: Prefer approving the minimum needed amount whenever possible.

human_approve_next_1.message: Check the spender address/operator and whether you recognize the dApp

human_approve_next_2.message: Consider revoking approvals later if you no longer use the site

human_approve_reco.message: Continue only if you trust the site and the spender makes sense.

human_approve_reco_unlimited.message: Avoid unlimited approvals unless you strongly trust the site and understand the risk.

human_setApprovalForAll_whatIs.message: Gives an operator permission to move ALL NFTs in a collection on your behalf.

human_setApprovalForAll_risk_1.message: This can allow draining NFTs if the operator is malicious or compromised

human_setApprovalForAll_safe_1.message: Only approve operators you fully recognize (e.g., known marketplaces).

human_setApprovalForAll_next_1.message: Verify the operator address and confirm the site is the intended marketplace

human_setApprovalForAll_reco.message: Cancel unless you are on a recognized marketplace and expect this action.

human_tx_whatIs.message: This will create an on-chain transaction if you approve it in your wallet.

human_tx_risk_1.message: Transactions can move funds or change permissions depending on the contract call

human_tx_safe_1.message: Always verify recipient, value, and the contract you're interacting with.

human_tx_next_1.message: Check the destination (to), value, and decoded action (if available)

human_tx_reco_suspicious.message: Cancel. Do not send transactions from suspicious domains.

human_tx_reco_ok.message: Continue only if you intended this action and the details look correct.

human_chain_whatIs.message: Changes the selected network in your wallet.

human_chain_risk_1.message: Wrong networks/RPCs can mislead you about assets or transactions

human_chain_next_1.message: Confirm chain name and chainId in the wallet prompt

human_chain_reco.message: Continue only if you expected a network change and the chain looks correct.

human_watchasset_whatIs.message: Adds a token/asset to your wallet UI for easier viewing.

human_watchasset_risk_1.message: Fake tokens can impersonate real ones—verify contract address and symbol

human_watchasset_safe_1.message: Cross-check token details on a trusted explorer (e.g., Etherscan).

human_watchasset_next_1.message: Verify token contract address and decimals

human_watchasset_reco.message: Continue only if token details match an official source.

human_generic_whatIs.message: A site requested a wallet action. Review details carefully.

human_generic_risk_1.message: Unknown prompts can be part of phishing flows

human_generic_safe_1.message: If in doubt, cancel and verify the site.

human_generic_next_1.message: Check the URL and read the wallet prompt details

human_generic_reco.message: Continue only if you understand and expected this request.
